item.name: Disk Available
item.description: Total disk available on the node. Not just available to OpenSearch, but the system as a whole.

item.name: Disk Indices
item.description: Size of indices currently stored on the nodes disk.

item.name: Disk Percentage Used
item.description: Percentage of disk storage in use on node. Not just by OpenSearch.

item.name: Disk Used
item.description: Total disk used on server, not just by OpenSearch.

item.name: Shard Count
item.description: Shard count currently stored on the node.

item.name: Field Data Breakers: Estimated size
item.description: The field data circuit breaker limits the heap memory required to load a field into the field data cache.

item.name: Field Data Breakers: Memory utilization
item.description: This is the current memory utilization before the circuit breaker is tripped at 100%, and further requests are declined. The field data circuit breaker limits the heap memory required to load a field into the field data cache.

item.name: Field Data Breakers: Size limit
item.description: The field data circuit breaker limits the heap memory required to load a field into the field data cache.

item.name: Field Data Breakers: Tripped count
item.description: The field data circuit breaker limits the heap memory required to load a field into the field data cache. This is the number of times the circuit breaker has been tripped since a service restart.

item.name: In-Flight Requests Breakers: Estimated size
item.description: The in-flight request circuit breaker limits the memory usage for all currently running incoming requests on transport and HTTP level. The memory usage for a request is based on the content length of the request and includes memory needed for the raw request and a structured object representing the request.

item.name: In-Flight Requests Breakers: Memory utilization
item.description:
The in-flight request circuit breaker limits the memory usage for all currently running incoming requests on transport and HTTP level. The memory usage for a request is based on the content length of the request and includes memory needed for the raw request and a structured object representing the request.
This is the current memory utilization before the circuit breaker is tripped at 100%, and further requests are declined.

item.name: In-Flight Requests Breakers: Size limit
item.description: The in-flight request circuit breaker limits the memory usage for all currently running incoming requests on transport and HTTP level. The memory usage for a request is based on the content length of the request and includes memory needed for the raw request and a structured object representing the request.

item.name: In-Flight Requests Breakers: Tripped count
item.description:
The in-flight request circuit breaker limits the memory usage for all currently running incoming requests on transport and HTTP level. The memory usage for a request is based on the content length of the request and includes memory needed for the raw request and a structured object representing the request.
This is the number of times the circuit breaker has been tripped since a service restart.

item.name: Parent Breakers: Estimated size
item.description: Breakers prevent out of memory errors in OpenSearch. The "Parent" breaker is the combination of all other breakers values. This is the current estimated size of memory utilization.

item.name: Parent Breakers: Memory utilization
item.description: Breakers prevent out of memory errors in OpenSearch. The "Parent" breaker is the combination of all other breakers values. This is the current memory utilization before the circuit breaker is tripped at 100%, and further requests are declined.

item.name: Parent Breakers: Size limit
item.description: Breakers prevent out of memory errors in OpenSearch. The "Parent" breaker is the combination of all other breakers values. This is the maximum size of memory utilization before the circuit breaker is tripped, and further requests are declined.

item.name: Parent Breakers: Tripped count
item.description:
Breakers prevent out of memory errors in OpenSearch. The "Parent" breaker is the combination of all other breakers values.
This is the number of times the circuit breaker has been tripped, and further requests were declined.

item.name: Request Breakers: Estimated size
item.description: The request circuit breaker limits the memory required to build data structures that are needed for a request (for example, when calculating aggregations).

item.name: Request Breakers: Memory utilization
item.description:
The request circuit breaker limits the memory required to build data structures that are needed for a request (for example, when calculating aggregations).
This is the current memory utilization before the circuit breaker is tripped at 100%, and further requests are declined.

item.name: Request Breakers: Size limit
item.description: The request circuit breaker limits the memory required to build data structures that are needed for a request (for example, when calculating aggregations).

item.name: Request Breakers: Tripped count
item.description:
The request circuit breaker limits the memory required to build data structures that are needed for a request (for example, when calculating aggregations).
This is the number of times the circuit breaker has been tripped since a service restart.

item.name: OpenSearch Cat Allocation
item.description:
Gather data from the API endpoint: _cat/allocation
https://opensearch.org/docs/latest/api-reference/cat/cat-allocation/

item.name: OpenSearch Cat Nodes
item.description: Gather data from the API endpoint: _cat/nodes

item.name: Net Transport: Total receive size changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Net Transport: Total transmit size changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Package Build Number
item.description: OpenSearch distribution package's build number.

item.name: Cluster Manager
item.description: True if the node is the cluster manager, False if not.

item.name: Completion Size
item.description: Size of completion

item.name: CPU
item.description: Recent CPU utilization.

trigger.name: Node is not responding
trigger.description:
Attempted to reach the API on node, but hasn't been responding for at least 3 minutes.
Failing API Endpoint: {$OS.PROTOCOL}://{$OS.HOSTNAME}:{$OS.PORT}/_cat/nodes

item.name: Disk Available
item.description: Total disk space available to the system.

item.name: Disk Used
item.description: Total disk space used in OpenSearch.

item.name: Disk Used Percent
item.description: Total disk space used in OpenSearch (as a percentage of total)

item.name: FieldData Evictions
item.description: FieldData Evictions

trigger.name: OpenSearch FieldData Evictions High

item.name: FieldData Memory Size
item.description: Used FieldData cache

item.name: File Descriptors Current
item.description: Currently used file descriptors.

item.name: File Descriptors Max
item.description: Maximum possible file descriptors.

item.name: File Descriptors Percent
item.description: Currently used file descriptors expressed as a percentage of maximum file descriptors.

trigger.name: OpenSearch File Descriptors Availability Low

item.name: Flush Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Flush Time
item.description: Time spent in flush

item.name: Flush Total
item.description: Total number of flushes.

item.name: Get Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Get Current
item.description: Current number of get operations.

trigger.name: OpenSearch Get Operations High

item.name: Get Exists Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Get Exists Time
item.description: Time spent in successful get operations.

item.name: Get Exists Total
item.description: Total number of successful get operations.

item.name: Get Missing Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Get Missing Time
item.description: Time spent in failed get operations.

item.name: Get Missing Total
item.description: Total number of failed get operations.

item.name: Get Time
item.description: Time spent in get

item.name: Get Total
item.description: Total number of get operations.

item.name: Heap Current
item.description: Currently used Java heap. These are Java objects in memory.

item.name: Heap Max
item.description: Maximum configured Java heap. These are Java objects in memory.

item.name: Heap Percent
item.description: Currently used Java heap. These are Java objects in memory. (Expressed as a percent of max)

trigger.name: OpenSearch JVM Heap Utilization High

item.name: HTTP Address
item.description: HTTP URL the node is listening on.

item.name: ID
item.description: Cluster assigned random ID

item.name: Delete Current
item.description: Current number of deletion operations on indices.

trigger.name: OpenSearch Delete Operations High

item.name: Delete Time
item.description: Time spent in index deletion operations.

item.name: Indexing Current
item.description: Current number of indexing operations.

trigger.name: OpenSearch Indexing Operations High

item.name: Indexing Total Failed
item.description: Total number of failed indexing operations.

item.name: Indexing Time
item.description: Time spent in indexing operations.

item.name: Indexing Total
item.description: Total number of indexing operations.

item.name: IP
item.description: IP the node is listening on

item.name: Package JDK
item.description: Node's running OpenSearch Java Development Kit (JDK) version number.

item.name: load_1m
item.description: CPU load for the last 1 minute.

item.name: load_5m
item.description: CPU load for the last 5 minutes.

item.name: load_15m
item.description: CPU load for the last 15 minutes.

item.name: Merges Current
item.description: Number of current merge operations.

item.name: Merges Current Docs
item.description: Current number of merging docs operations.

item.name: Merges Current Size
item.description: Size of current merge operations.

item.name: Merges Total Count
item.description: Total number of completed merge operations.

item.name: Merges Total Docs
item.description: Total number of completed merged documents.

item.name: Merges Total Size
item.description: Total size of merged operations.

item.name: Merges Time
item.description: Time spent in merge operations.

item.name: Name
item.description: Admin determined node name.

item.name: Node Role (Letters)
item.description: Roles assigned to the node in the 'single letter form'. m:master eligible node, d:data node, i:ingest node, -:coordinating node only, r:remote cluster client

trigger.name: OpenSearch Node Roles Changed

item.name: Node Roles
item.description: Roles assigned to the node.

item.name: PID
item.description: Process ID of OpenSearch Service

item.name: Port
item.description: Process ID of OpenSearch Service

trigger.name: OpenSearch Node Port Changed

item.description: Query Cache Evictions

item.description: Used Query Cache

item.description: Query Cache Miss Count

item.name: Ram Current
item.description: Currently used system memory.

item.name: Ram Max
item.description: Total system memory.

item.name: Ram Percent
item.description: Currently used system memory expressed as a percentage of total system memory.

item.name: Refresh Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Refresh External Changes
item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Refresh External Total Time
item.description: Time spent in external refresh operations.

item.name: Refresh External Total
item.description: Total number of external refreshes.

item.name: Refresh Listeners
item.description: Total number of pending refresh listeners.

item.description: Time spent in refresh operations.

item.name: Refresh Total
item.description: Total number of refresh operations.

item.name: Request Cache Evictions
item.description: Request Cache Evictions

trigger.name: OpenSearch Request Cache Evictions High

item.name: Request Cache Hits
item.description: Request Cache Hits - change calculated from previous value

item.name: Request Cache Hits Total
item.description: Request Cache Hit Count

item.name: Request Cache Memory Size
item.description: Used Request Cache

item.name: Request Cache Miss Total
item.description: Request Cache Miss Counter.

item.name: Request Cache Misses
item.description: Request Cache Miss Counter - calculated change since previous value.

trigger.name: OpenSearch Request Cache Miss Count High

item.name: Cache Evictions
item.description: Number of script cache evictions.

item.name: Script Compilations
item.description: Number of script compilations.

item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.name: Script Compilation Limit Triggered
item.description: Number of script cache compilation limits triggered.

trigger.description:
OpenSearch's script compilation limit was reached.
Node Name: {$OS.NAME}

item.description: Average query concurrency.

item.description: Time spent in fetch phase.

item.name: Search Fetch Total
item.description: Total number of fetch operations.

item.name: Search Open Contexts
item.description: Number of open search contexts.

item.description: Current number of open point in time contexts.

item.name: Search Point in Time Time
item.description: Time spent with point in time contexts held open.

item.name: Search Point in Time Total
item.description: Total number of completed point in time contexts.

item.description: Zabbix calculated difference of last value and current value.

item.description: Time spent with scroll contexts held open.

item.name: Search Scroll Total
item.description: Total number of completed scroll contexts

item.name: Segments Count
item.description: Number of segments.

item.name: Segments Fixed Bitset Memory Size
item.description: Memory used by fixed bit sets for nested object field types and type filters for types referred in _parent fields.

item.name: Segments Index Writer Memory Size
item.description: Amount of memory used by index writer.

item.name: Segments Memory Size
item.description: Memory used by segments.

item.name: Segments Version Map Memory Size
item.description: Amount of memory used by version map.

item.description: Node's running OpenSearch version number.

discovery_rule.name: Node discovery
discovery_rule.description: Make Zabbix host aware of all other nodes for additional processing and alerts.

macro.description: Maximum FieldData eviction operations on node to throw alert at.
File Descriptor utilization percentage to throw alert at.
Maximum Get operations on node to throw alert at.
JVM Heap utilization percentage to throw alert at.
Hostname of the OpenSearch cluster to make API requests to.
OpenSearch automatically assigned ID for the node.
Maximum Deletion operations on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Indexing operations on node to throw alert at.
Name of node (case sensitive)
Password to authenticate to OpenSearch with.
OpenSearch port that is being listened for API requests.
OpenSearch protocol being used (http/https)
Maximum Request Cache Eviction operations on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Request Cache Miss Count on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Concurrent Average Slice counter on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Search Concurrent Query operations on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Fetch Phase operations on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Open Search Contexts on node to throw alert at.
Maximum Search Query operations on node to throw alert at.
Username to authenticate to OpenSearch with.
